title: Still dishonorable
body:
So i was banned a couple months ago for being toxic, which i understand why i was banned.

Because of the ban i lost my honor level and i thought id get it back soon so i didnt mind, over these months i have fixed myself up and reformed.
(I even have gotten over 40 friend reqs this week and had 2 other toxic people banned.)

and even with all of this that has happened i still have not gotten my honor unlocked yet can anyone please tell me how to get this unlocked? i have 6 chests that i want to open but i really dont want to buy keys since i dont have much money at all.

Thank you for all the help and advice {{sticker:katarina-love}}  <-----   (Im a kat main and i approve of this)

replies.body: Your hextech loot and honor progress is actually unlocked already on this account! You're currently able to get chests and key frags to drop, as well as gaining Honor at the normal rates. This might just be an unlucky streak with those keys =\
hi can i still get end of season rewards, when i got a 14 day ban for saying some stuff, right now i am unbanned and reformed plz answer me <3
if the ban was before like august 28th or something i thhink
